newsitem.title: DUBAI: Saudi beheads national man for shooting.
newsitem.headline: Saudi beheads national man for shooting.

text.p: Saudi Arabia on Friday beheaded a Saudi man for fatally shooting a male relative because of a misunderstanding, the 17th execution in the kingdom this month.

A Saudi Interior Ministry statement carried by the official Saudi Press Agency (SPA) said Msafar bin Nouwar al-Utaibi was beheaded in the Saudi capital Riyadh after a court found him guilty of killing Mitleq bin Hleil al-Utaibi.
It did not say how both men were related.
The executions raised to 40 the number of people put to death this year in Saudi Arabia, which enforces Islamic sharia law by publicly beheading convicted murderers, drug smugglers and rapists.
